description: Number of polyominoes with n cells, symmetric about axis 2.
comments: This sequence counts polyominoes with exactly the symmetry group D_4 generated by horizontal and vertical reflections.
references: D. H. Redelmeier, Counting polyominoes: yet another attack, Discrete Math., 36 (1981), 191-203.

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 03 2000
